name: luminomorphism
description: A UI design system built around light, blur, ambient motion and perceptual feedback.

scripts.minify:css: node -e "require('fs').readdirSync('src').filter(f => f.endsWith('.css')).forEach(f => require('child_process').execSync(`npx csso src/${f} --output dist/${f.replace('.css', '.min.css')}`))"
scripts.rename:obfuscated: mv dist/sensitive/l-particle-net-v3.js dist/l-particle-net-v3.min.js && mv dist/sensitive/l-magnetic-cluster.js dist/l-magnetic-cluster.min.js
scripts.build: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run obfuscate:sensitive && npm run rename:obfuscated
scripts.release: npm version patch && git push origin main --tags && npm publish --access public

author: Victor Mihai
